entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 24. POP 40%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries this evening. Clearing overnight. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 early this evening. Low minus 24. Wind chill minus 19 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Sunny. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early in the morning. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 19 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Tuesday 28 February 2023
